ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.017: Azores, Sao Miguel, S Coast, E of Praia do Pópulo, in front of church; 37°45'N 25°36'; rocky flat with large tidepools; shore-collecting; 24.ix.1979

AV.620113: Italy, prov. Genova, Sestri Levante;13.i.1962
